title: Chicken Nachos with Ranchitas Naturales
ingredients: 1 lb cooked and shredded chicken breast
½ cup mozzarella or cheddar cheese for melting
instructions: Step 1. Heat the oil in a skillet and sauté the chicken. Season with salt and pepper as it cooks.
Step 2. Add the ketchup and a splash of water.
Step 3. Cook gently until the chicken becomes slightly saucy.
Step 4. Place Ranchitas Naturales on a plate and add a portion of chicken on top.
Step 5. Sprinkle cheese over the chicken and microwave until melted.
Step 6. Remove and top with jalapeño, cilantro, tomato, and bacon.
description: Nachos with juicy shredded chicken on a base of Ranchitas Naturales. Perfect for sharing on any occasion.
